channel.title: A GOOD starting place for my 508 server
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I'm currently working on a 508 server, and I can't think of any good starting places forwhen you start the server.
I've thought about all sorts of places but they all have bad things about them.
Such as BH, it's just too typical, and too dark imo.
Got any ideas?
Ps. It would be nice if you could also post Coordinates of the places you suggest, would save alot of time.

item.title: A GOOD starting place for my 508 server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Yeah I would do that, But for now It’s going to be a Pking server until I make more thing’s in it such as Fully functional skills etc.

Read full topic
item.source: A GOOD starting place for my 508 server

item.title: A GOOD starting place for my 508 server
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I personally say go old-school and start your server off right in Lumbridge, or in that tutorial place.

Read full topic
item.source: A GOOD starting place for my 508 server

item.title: A GOOD starting place for my 508 server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

davidi2:

Just a thought, how bout the alkahrid castle? It has a bank, and you could have different training monsters in the rooms. Just a thought… what do you think?

Nah I think it would be too small.

[quote=“Corrupted_Chaos, post:2, topic:242406”]I’ve always said my project was going to be based in the Prison Pete mini game.
I’ve also thought about the Monks right outside of Edgeville. I don’t have a way to get you the cords, or I would.[/quote]

The prison pete mini game area sounds alright, but the edgeville area is too small :(.

Read full topic
item.source: A GOOD starting place for my 508 server

item.title: A GOOD starting place for my 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Corrupted_Chaos Corrupted_Chaos
item.description:
@Corrupted_Chaos wrote:

Was used on a lot of servers imo. However, prison pete may also be. Just Prison Pete seems imo like a good place.

PROS
Open area
Can fit plenty of shops into the area.
Plenty of people

CONS
It’s sorta “dark”

Read full topic
item.source: A GOOD starting place for my 508 server
